banner.title: EMERGENCY SYMPTOMS DETECTED
banner.subtitle: Based on your symptoms, this may require immediate medical attention.

actions.call911: Call 911 (US) or your local emergency number immediately
actions.goToER: If safe, go to the nearest emergency room
actions.stayWithSomeone: If possible, have someone stay with you
actions.noSelfTreat: Do NOT attempt self-treatment for emergency conditions

banner.disclaimer: HeyDoc is not a substitute for emergency medical care. Your safety is our priority.

mentalHealth.crisisLine: If you're having thoughts of suicide, please call the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline (US) or your local crisis line.
mentalHealth.notAlone: You are not alone. Help is available.
